content: workday scarf a simple little garter stitch project that incorporates a smaller version of the lace edging used in the workday shawl from the book norwegian handknits by sue flanders and janine kosel this project is every knitter s dream easy to knit and beautiful to wear referred to as comfort knitting this scarf offers the ease and beauty of garter stitch with a lovely lace edging that is worked at the same time as the body of the scarf the best way to relax after a long workday - knitting that only requires attention to detail every 8th row materials and tools one skein 3 52 oz/100g = 454 yds/416m araucania huasco hand-painted pure extra fine merino wool size 3 ndls any length finished measurements length 60 width 1-1/2 to 8 taper pattern note for a smooth crisp edge with yarn in front of work slip the first stitch in each row purlwise after slipping first stitch move the yarn to the back of the work and continue to knit the remaining sts directions co 11 sts increase row row 1-7 s1 k to end row 8 bobble 4 sts yo k1 4x yo k to end repeat increase row 1-8 until there are 56 sts decrease row row 1-7 s1 k to end row 8 bobble 4 sts yo k1 4x yo k3tog k to end repeat decrease row 1-8 until there are 11 sts remaining bind off tuck in ends block and enjoy © 2016 designed by sue flanders
